name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_obligations_start_date_day
title: On what date would you like to begin the timing of your obligations specified in the offer?
label: Obligations Date
description: This is for inspections, contingencies, document reviews, close of escrow, and timing of other obligations in the offer.
tips: Choose a date that allows enough time to coordinate with your property sale timeline.
small_print: All obligation timelines in the purchase agreement will begin on this date.

contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_ob.name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_obligations_start_date_day
contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_ob.tooltip: Select the start date for your obligations
